text: Karan Veer Mehra is an Indian television actor. He started his career with the show, Remix in 2005. He was also seen play the lead role in Sony SAB TV, Biwi aur Main. He has also worked in Bollywood movies such as Ragini MMS 2, Mere Dad Ki Maruti, Blood Money, Badmashiyaan and Amen. He is recently the winner of Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi 14 and Bigg Boss 18.http://movies.indialivetoday.com/2017/01/13/karan-veer-mehra-spreads-road- safety-awareness-in-mumbai/ India Today == Early and personal life == Karan Mehra was born in Delhi. He studied in a boarding school in mussoorie : Wynberg Allen School and Delhi Public School (DPS).
